## Example 1 

```r
do some code up here

if this statement is true  
  do this thing  
else  
  do this otherthing  
```

## Example 2 

Here == means "is equal to"

```python
x = 3  
if x == 3
    print("hello")
else  
    print ("bye")
```

In words:

```r
set x equal to 3

if x is equal to 3  
  print "hello"  
else  
  print "bye"  
```
. . . 

"hello"

## String 1
```python
name = "Alice"
if name == "Alice":
    print("hello")
else:
    print("bye")
```

In words:

```r
set name equal to "Alice" 

if name is equal to "Alice"  
  print("hello")  
else  
  print("bye") 
```
. . . 

"hello"
